doc:
John Hayes (director) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Hayes_(director) 0 John Hayes (March 1, 1930 – August 21, 2000) was an American film director, producer, screenwriter, and actor. Hayes is best known for directing low-budget B-movie features and later, exploitation films. John_Hayes ( March_1_,_1930 – August_21_,_2000 ) was an_American_film_director , producer , screenwriter , and actor . Hayes is_best_known for directing low-budget_B-movie_features and later , exploitation_films .
